title: Updated Client Feb 2017, Champion Screen Selection loads slow..
body:
Does any of your have the same problem?

1. Every loading screen takes longer than the previous client. (Chosing match type, opening profile information, etc)
2. Especially the Champion select screen , after you accept the match, the champ select shows up after 6secs+ with black screen before the champ selects load- sometimes i am left with 10 secs to pick a champ: or missed the match because i couldnt select any (screen is still loading in black).

*im using alienware so my PC is not the problem... 

anyone knows how to solve this? (besides uninstalling:P)
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
Do you still experience these delays if you collapse your friends list *prior* to queueing up for a match? I've provided a screenshot to show you what I mean:

(Click to enlarge)
https://i.imgur.com/wMLOFya.png

There are some known issues with the client, which you may be experiencing. If this workaround resolves the issue, then you're most likely running into the known issue.

i guess its just generally slow? way slower than the previous client, but i can feel it the most in the champ selects.. (takes up to 10 sec) the rests are slow, but bearable.. thanks tho.. hope it could b fixed.
We deployed a hotfix for this last night, so your client should have patched that in. Are you still experiencing these issues now?

funny thing is when i try to collapse it my client actually freezes 
do know if i should add that to a support ticket regarding the black screen?
or is this an entirely different issue?

it always is takes longer time to do any action. doesnt matter if its in champ selects.. (mine freezes for 5 secs before it works, and if i press it to expand it will take another 5..) but no black screen in collapsing the social chat..
